#summary Highlight comments made with a specific email address
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Highlight all comments based on the email =
== Changes to the Comment Highlighter plugin ==
  # Go to *Admin* -> *Options* -> *Comment Highlighter*
  # Click the button ||Add a new comment highlight||
  # Check the checkbox at "email" and write the email address in the text field - i.e. `johndoe@example.org`
  # Make sure the "Global" checkbox is checked
  # Make sure to write a class name at the "Class(es)" text field - i.e. "`admincomment`"
  # Click the button ||Add this comment highlight||

== Changes to the style sheet ==
  # Now go to *Admin* -> *Presentation* -> *Theme Editor* and choose Stylesheet in the right menu
  # Add the following (or the style of your choice) to the style sheet:
{{{
.commentlist .admincomment {
  background-color: #eeeeff;
  border: #ddddee 1px solid;
}
}}}

== Result ==
All comments made by any person who has written `johndoe@example.org` as their email address will now be "highlighted" according to the style above.
